I want to make an interactive map using `leaflet` to decide where to live in Bristol 

```{r packages, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(rgdal)
```

```{r read shapefile. message=FALSE}
shp <- readOGR(".","~/Data/ST03_line.shp")

```
```{r map}
m <- leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        setView(-2.5879, 51.4545, zoom = 12)
m

```
